branch.title: Branches
branch.desc: Abstract branches lets you manage, version and document your designs in one place.

branch.title: Manage your account
branch.desc: Configure your account settings, such as your email, profile details and password.

branch.title: Manage organizations, teams and projects
branch.desc: Use Abstract organizations, teams, and projects to organize your people and your work.

branch.title: Authenticate to Abstract
branch.desc: Set up and configure SSO, SCIM, and Just-in-Time provisioning.
